class header.

File: GrPolygonGroupUberUVPatch.cpp Author: Kevin Bray Created: 12-05-08 Copyright © 2004 Bootstrap Studios. All rights reserved. project includes. class GrPolygonUberPatch ctor & dtor

copy the polygon indices passed in.

set the translation in the UV matrix.

adjust the polygon uvs so they're relative to the center of a tile.

now calculate the plane data for the patch.
